en.title: Tribunal form sent
en.line1: Your tribunal form and related documents have been sent.
en.line3:
We would like to hear your thoughts
Complete this short 5-minutes survey to help improve our services for you and others
Please leave your your feedback
en.line4: What did you think of this service?

cy.title: Ffurflen y tribiwnlys wedi’i hanfon
cy.serviceName: Appeal to the First-tier Tribunal (in welsh)
cy.line1: Mae ffurflenni’r tribiwnlys a’ch dogfennau perthnasol wedi’u hanfon.
cy.line3: If you do not receive this email, please contact the Tribunal using the details on your completed tribunal form. (in welsh)
cy.line4: Beth yw eich barn am y gwasanaeth hwn?
